ygData.subject: Re: Something strange...
ygData.msgSnippet: They always do that whenever you talk next to one I think.  Like when I found King Ak anon and hailed him and the clockwork next to him answer with the move
ygData.messageBody:
They always do that whenever you talk next to one I think. Like when I
found King Ak'anon and hailed him and the clockwork next to him answer with
the move along message. heh thats when I came to the conclusion that our
king is really a highly advanced clockwork. Thats why he looks like a
little human. :)

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> I don't know if this has any relevency, but I was talking to a GM in
Ak'Anon
> next to one of the clock work spiders, and we all know what happens when
you
> hail them right? They say something to the effect of:
> "This unit is not designed for casual conversation. Please move along."
> Well, when I was done talking to the GM he said Good night to me before he
> left. The spider said his usual message about moving along. I said good
> night to the GM and the spider said it again. All the spiders respond to
> "Good night." in the same way. This could mean abolutely nothing, but I
just
> though it was odd.
